user_instruction: 'Send an email to my pen-pal Maria (maria@unibarcelona.es) to catch up. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request to Draft & Send a Catch-Up Email to Maria

Hi there,

Could you please draft and send a friendly catch-up email to my pen-pal Maria (maria@unibarcelona.es)? Feel free to check my Notion workspace for any background information or recent notes that might help personalize the message.

Thank you very much!

Best,
John

final_output:
